title: Jon Voight appreciative to spend just five minutes with daughter Angelina Jolie
text:
Jon Voight appreciative to spend just five minutes with Angelina Jolie(Picture: WireImage / Getty)

Jon Voight and his daughter Angelina Jolie may have had their differences in the past, however, it seems as though they have finally put their dramas behind them.

While promoting her new movie Maleficent: Mistress of Evil, the Lara Croft star was supported by her dad during the premiere.

Here the 80-year-old spoke to The Hollywood Reporter about his relationship with Ange, and how he is happy just to be able to spend five minutes with her.

He told the publication: ‘It’s wonderful for me to spend time with Angie. Any five minutes I get, I’m always appreciative, so this is great that I could come and hang out with her a little bit — and the kids, too.

‘I’m a father and a fan. Like all really fine actors, Angie has got her own unique approach and, you know, set of understandings.’

The star is currently promoting her new film (Picture: Invision/AP)

She was supported by her children at the event (Picture: Rex)

The actor added: ‘She’s very strong about that. When she comes to a set, she’s so totally comfortable. She knows what she wants.’

Back in 2002, the father and daughter duo stopped talking to each other, after he pleaded on Access Hollywood for his 44-year-old to seek help for her ‘serious mental problems’.

However, they ended up reconciling in seven years later in 2009, with Jon being by Ange’s side ever since.

And he’s not the only family member to show their support on the A-lister’s tour, as the mother-of-six’s children made an appearance on the red carpet with her.

Jon Voight also made an appearance (Picture: FilmMagic)

They rekindled their relationship back in 2009 (Picture: Getty Images)

During Wednesday’s London premiere, twins Vivienne and Knox were both in attendance, looking comfy in a jumpsuit and suit respectively, while 13-year-old Shiloh kept warm in trousers and a silk bomber jacket.

Zahara, 14, however, made the most of the glamorous occasion and wore a metallic ball gown with layers of tulle with a dramatic black nail and teal accent nail.

On Tuesday Zahara and Shiloh were the only two to join their mum in Rome.

While Angelina’s eldest son Maddox, 18, had supported the actress at the Tokyo premiere from university in Seoul.

Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil is in UK cinemas 18 October.
